alias.docker-compose runserver: docker-compose run --service-ports --rm backend pipenv run server 0.0.0.0:8000
alias.docker-compose rmv: docker volume rm $(docker volume ls -qf dangling=true)
alias.docker-compose run --no-deps --rm backen: docker-compose run --no-deps --rm backend pipenv run manage makemessages --locale ru
docker-compose run --no-deps --rm backend pipenv run manage compilemessages --locale ru
docker-compose run --no-deps --rm backend pipenv run manage makemigrations
